summary: Contact page was updated to show an "India Support Contact" heading with email (mailto) and Instagram link, and the prior form appears removed. However, the page includes additional content beyond just the email + Instagram handle, and the Instagram handle text does not match the exact required string.

missing_requirements.requirement: The page displays the Instagram handle exactly as: awarenessoveraddictionofficial.
missing_requirements.reason: The rendered Instagram link text includes an '@' prefix, so the displayed handle is not exactly the required string.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the existing Contact page content with a single section titled "India Support Contact" that displays only the provided email address and Instagram handle.
missing_requirements.reason: The page includes additional UI/content beyond just the email and Instagram handle (intro paragraph, an extra "Contact Information" card title, and a footer paragraph linking to /resources), so it is not limited to only those two items nor a single minimal section.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx (includes "Reach out to us for support and information.")
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx (includes "For immediate help and resources..." and link to "/resources")
